SELECT TB_CO_EMS.EMS_ID, TB_CO_EMS.EMS_NAME, TB_CO_EMS.IP_ADDRESS, TB_CO_EMS.PORT, TB_CO_EMS.VENDOR_ID, IFNULL(TB_CO_VENDOR.VENDOR_NAME,'-') AS VENDOR_NAME, DATE_FORMAT(TB_CO_EMS.INSTALL_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS INSTALL_DATE, DATE_FORMAT(TB_CO_EMS.UPDATE_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS UPDATE_DATE FROM TB_CO_EMS LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CO_VENDOR ON TB_CO_EMS.VENDOR_ID = TB_CO_VENDOR.VENDOR_ID WHERE TB_CO_EMS.EMS_ID = #{hssEms_id}
